alert.note: Alert for Bibb; Houston; Jones; Monroe; Twiggs (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 26 at 10:05AM EST until January 29 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Georgia... Ocmulgee River near Macon affecting Jones, Houston, Monroe, Twiggs and Bibb Counties. For the Ocmulgee River Basin...including Jackson, Juliette, Griffin, Juliette, Macon, Dames Ferry, Macon, Clinchfield, Hawkinsville, Hawkinsville, Byron, Abbeville, McRae, Scotland, Lumber City...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO LATE MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Ocmulgee River near Macon. * WHEN...From this morning to late Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 21 feet, Minor flooding expands. An increasing amount of the Macon GreenWay Ocmulgee Heritage Trail floods north of the Martin Luther King Boulevard bridge. The flood waters will be up to two feet deep on portions of the trail and both banks overflow upstream from the bridge. Large portions of agricultural lands east of Macon and well downstream will be under 1 to 4 feet of water. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:30 AM EST Friday the stage was 18.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 21.3 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Monday morning. - Flood stage is 18 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta. The next statement will be issued this evening at 1015 PM EST.
